newsitem.title: HUNGARY: HUNGARY SELECTS RABOBANK AS RABA SELLOFF ADVISER.
newsitem.headline: HUNGARY SELECTS RABOBANK AS RABA SELLOFF ADVISER.

text.p: Hungary's state privatisation agency has appointed on Wednesday Rabobank Hungaria as adviser for the privatisation of truck components manufacturer Raba Rt.
"Rabobank was declared winner in a very close competition," APV said in a statement following its board meeting.
It added that APV will sign a contract with Rabobank within 30 days.
Rabobank Hungaria is a unit of Rabobank Nederland.
APV Rt plans to sell its 79.27 percent stake in Raba, which has a registered capital of 11.6 billion forints.
The comany is based in Gyor, north-east Hungary.
Full company name is Raba Magyar Vagon- es Gepgyar Rt.
